channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: GBニュースの共同経営者ポール・マーシャル氏が3年ぶりにGBニュースの取締役を退任、テレグラフ紙買収の新たなライバル入札を検討しているとの報道がある中（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
GB News co-owner Paul Marshall steps down from the board of GB News after three year, amid reports he is considering a new rival bid to buy the Telegraph  —  Sir Paul Marshall said he was leaving GB News on a “secure growth trajectory”.  —  GB News co-lead investor Sir Paul Marshall …

item.title: カルマターズCEOのニール・チェイスに、ザ・マークアップ買収の経緯、非営利団体ニュースの統合増加、そして今後の展開について聞く（Sarah Scire/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
An interview with CalMatters CEO Neil Chase on how the The Markup acquisition happened, consolidation uptick in nonprofit news, and why there is more to come  —  Nonprofit news has seen an uptick in mergers, acquisitions, and other consolidations.  CalMatters CEO Neil Chase still says “I don't think we've seen enough yet.”

item.title: 4月27日のWHCDを前に、NBCニュースのホワイトハウス上級特派員でWHCA会長のケリー・オドネルに、メディアアクセスの変化などについてQ&A（Tom Jones/Poynter）
item.description:
Tom Jones / Poynter:
Q&A with Kelly O'Donnell, NBC News White House senior correspondent and WHCA president, ahead of the WHCD on April 27, on changes in media access and more  —  Advocating for her press corps colleagues has become a second full-time job for NBC News' senior White House correspondent.

item.title: G/O MediaがThe Onionを元Twilio CEOのジェフ・ローソンが所有するシカゴの新会社Global Tetrahedronに売却、元NBC News上級記者のベン・コリンズがCEOに就任（Katie Robertson/New York Times）
item.description:
Katie Robertson / New York Times:
G/O Media sells The Onion to Global Tetrahedron, a new Chicago firm owned by former Twilio CEO Jeff Lawson; former NBC News senior reporter Ben Collins is CEO  —  The satirical news website was bought by a new firm in Chicago that took inspiration for its name, Global Tetrahedron, from a book written by The Onion's staff.

item.title: ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙は、バイデン氏が座談会インタビューに応じるか否かにかかわらず、「完全かつ公平に」バイデン氏の取材を続けると発表した。
item.description:
The New York Times Company:
The New York Times says it will continue to cover Biden “fully and fairly” regardless of whether he gives the paper a sit-down interview  —  A spokesperson for The New York Times responds to recent reporting about a free press and reporting on the president.

item.title: 情報筋ParamountとSkydanceは契約に近づくが、4月30日を期限とするParamountとCharterの契約更新は大きなハードル（Alex Sherman/CNBC）
item.description:
Alex Sherman / CNBC:
Sources: Paramount and Skydance move closer to a deal, but Paramount's renewal agreement with Charter, which has an April 30 deadline, is a significant hurdle  —  WATCH NOW  —  Paramount and Skydance inch closer to a merger as key hurdle looms  —  Paramount Global and Skydance Media …

item.title: アマゾンのプライム・ビデオ、ユーチューブ、NBCユニバーサル、ディズニー、WBDが参加する、2024-25シーズン以降のNBAライブスポーツ放映権獲得競争について（ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
A look at the competition for NBA live sports media rights after the 2024-25 season, involving Amazon's Prime Video, YouTube, NBCUniversal, Disney, and WBD  —  League is advancing toward lucrative deals with incumbent partners and is in talks with tech giants as well as NBCUniversal

item.title: Roku、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比19%増の$882M（予想$848.62M）、純損失は$50.9M（前年同期$193.6M）、アクティブアカウント数は8,160万で2023年第4四半期から160万増加（Jennifer Maas/Variety
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
Roku reports Q1 revenue up 19% YoY to $882M, vs. $848.62M est., a net loss of $50.9M, compared to $193.6M YoY, and 81.6M active accounts, up 1.6M from Q4 2023  —  Roku reported its first-quarter 2024 earnings Thursday, revealing the company reached 81.6 million active accounts …

item.title: スナップ、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比21%増の$11.9B（予想$11.2B）、DAUは前年同期比10%増の4.22万人、純損失は$30.5M（前年同期$32.9M）、SNAPは時間外で20%以上上昇（Ashley Capoot/CNBC
item.description:
Ashley Capoot / CNBC:
Snap reports Q1 revenue up 21% YoY to $1.19B, vs. $1.12B est., DAUs up 10% YoY to 422M, a net loss of $305M, compared to $329M YoY; SNAP is up 20%+ after hours  —  WATCH NOW  —  Snap stock soars following beat on revenue, earnings and daily active users  —  Snap reported first-quarter results …

item.title: YouTubeの第1四半期広告収入、前年同期比21％増の81億ドル（推定77.2億ドル）、第1四半期としては過去最高（Todd Spangler/Variety
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
YouTube's Q1 ad revenue climbs 21% YoY to $8.1B, vs. $7.72B estimated, its highest Q1 total to date  —  YouTube keeps eating up more share of the advertising pie: The Google-owned video giant posted $8.1 billion in ad sales for the first quarter of 2024, its highest Q1 total to date.

item.title: AMI元CEOデイヴィッド・ペッカー氏、トランプ氏のNY裁判で再証言 トランプ氏がネガティブな記事を消した動機は家族ではなく選挙運動だったとの見方を示す（ABCニュース）
item.description:
ABC News:
Ex-AMI CEO David Pecker testifies again in Trump's NY trial and says he believes Trump's motivation to kill negative stories was about the campaign, not family  —  Former President Trump is in court on Day 7 of his criminal trial in New York.  —  Former President Donald Trump is on trial in New York City …

item.title: G/OメディアのCEO、ジム・スパンフェラーが今日送ったEメールだ。グローバル・テトラヘドロン社は実在の会社だそうだ [image] (Katie Robertson/@katie_robertson)
item.description:
Katie Robertson / @katie_robertson:
More here — this is the email Jim Spanfeller, CEO of G/O Media, sent out today. And yes I'm told Global Tetrahedron is in fact a real company [image]

item.title: プライム・ビデオは、権利保有者であるロジャーズ・コミュニケーションズと契約を結び、2024-25と2025-26シーズンにカナダで月曜日の夜にNHLの試合を放送する（Etan Vlessing/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Etan Vlessing / The Hollywood Reporter:
Prime Video will air NHL games on Monday nights in Canada for the 2024-25 and 2025-26 seasons, after striking a deal with rights holder Rogers Communications  —  The two-year deal will see National Hockey League games appear exclusively on the Amazon streaming site on Monday nights.

item.title: イタリア国営放送RAIのジャーナリストたちは、ジョルジア・メローニ右翼政権による「息苦しい統制」に反対し、5月6日に24時間ストライキを計画している（Elvira Pollina/Reuters）
item.description:
Elvira Pollina / Reuters:
Journalists at Italian state broadcaster RAI plan a 24-hour strike May 6 against “suffocating control” of their work by Giorgia Meloni's right-wing government  —  Journalists at Italian state broadcaster RAI will strike next month in protest against the “suffocating control” …

item.title: AA/WARCレポート：英国の2023年の広告費は前年比6.1％増の366億ポンド、検索広告は11.9％増の147億ポンド、ニュースブランドは6.3％減の7億7400万ポンド（Dominic Ponsford/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Dominic Ponsford / Press Gazette:
AA/WARC report: UK ad spend grew 6.1% YoY to £36.6B in 2023, with search advertising up 11.9% to £14.7B and national newsbrands spending down 6.3% to £774M  —  UK ad market grew 6.1% to £36.6bn - but tech platforms take all the growth.
